title: Ola's MoveOS 3 to roll out for all its scooters from next week: Key features
description: MoveOS 3 is Ola's third major over-the-air upgrade for its e-scooter series. Currently, only the Ola S1 Air has MoveOS 3. The software was announced by Ola in Diwali.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
